feature.label: CloverETL Designer
feature.description:
CloverETL Designer - Visual designer of CloverETL data transformations. (C) Javlin, a.s.
CloverETL Designer is visual designer of data transformations which are executed by CloverETL Engine. The CloverETL Designer has been developed as an Eclipse platform plugin and is well integrated with other Eclipse functionality.
